Conversation.Dialog: Hey Val, ready for the festival?
Remember this is the most important event in the year

I left some carrots in my house, up this way, you can take them
I just forgot where did I left the key

I don't know. Just saw a silhouette running towards the forest
There is no time to waste, let's catch the thief
Don't worry mom, I'll be back soon
Once you find the thief, call us
